docs.snippet: Mr. Rubinger, an Austria native who fought in 1948 for Israel’s independence, is known for a photo of paratroopers gazing at the Western Wall during the 1967 Arab-Israeli war....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Rubinger, an Austria native who fought in 1948 for Israel’s independence, is known for a photo of paratroopers gazing at the Western Wall during the 1967 Arab-Israeli war.

headline.main: David Rubinger, 92, Photographer Who Chronicled Israeli History, Dies
headline.print_headline: David Rubinger, Who Captured Israeli History, Dies at 92

docs.snippet: A Kansas man who survived an apparently racially motivated shooting at a suburban Kansas City restaurant and bar is out of the hospital and has already visited the scene of the attack....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Kansas man who survived an apparently racially motivated shooting at a suburban Kansas City restaurant and bar is out of the hospital and has already visited the scene of the attack.

headline.print_headline: Survivor of Kansas Bar Shooting Released From Hospital

docs.snippet: Wallabies flanker Scott Fardy will leave Australia for Irish provincial team Leinster at the end of the season but his international and ACT Brumbies team mate Sam Carter has signed a contract extension to stay at home until 2019....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wallabies flanker Scott Fardy will leave Australia for Irish provincial team Leinster at the end of the season but his international and ACT Brumbies team mate Sam Carter has signed a contract extension to stay at home until 2019.

headline.main: Fardy Off to Leinster, Carter Stays in Australia
headline.print_headline: Fardy Off to Leinster, Carter Stays in Australia

docs.snippet: Mrs. Javits, the wife of Jacob K. Javits, a United States senator from 1957 to 1981, was a bon vivant who once said, “I’m my husband’s wife, and I’m striving to be my own person.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mrs. Javits, the wife of Jacob K. Javits, a United States senator from 1957 to 1981, was a bon vivant who once said, “I’m my husband’s wife, and I’m striving to be my own person.”

headline.main: Marian Javits, Proto-Feminist and Widow of New York Senator, Dies at 92
